title: Ping Checker
body:
Kia Ora Riot, 

I've been playing league for a while now (years! *shudder* {{item:3070}} ), and one thing i have noticed playing from NZ is how sporadic connections can be. I have games that will sit at a flat 30ms throughout, games that spike 200ms every 3 mins and games where you just cant move (not fun for anyone involved). What i would like to know is if there is any way you guys n gals can give me a way to check my ping when im still in the launcher, without having to que up or run a bots game. It would take a bit of refining, sure, but it would also get rid of the "Im lagging im afk" excuse we see in low elo so much. I dont want to play a game were i cant move, my teammates dont want a team member who does nothing or feeds, and noone wants the enemy team to be pushovers because they have a poor connection. Keen to hear you thoughts! {{champion:36}}

replies.body:
Hi HoneyBadger,

A couple of questions:
* What ISP are you with?
* Do you have connection issues to anything else on the internet?
* Do you connect to your router via a cable or via wifi?

While we don't have a ping checker like this to use, there are a couple of ways you can check up on your connection health.

* Before playing a game, you can run a trace route to our game server network (103.240.227.1).  This will probably be the best indication of the health of your network connectivity to the game servers.
* You can use [Logs of Lag](http://logsoflag.com/) to check previous game logs to look at stability patterns over the course of a game.
* Additionally, there are some good suggestions in the support article [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) that might help improve your overall stability.

Let me know how you go.

Mindstar

Kia Ora Mindstar,

I'm with Spark NZ currently, and connectivity issues are with  the whole internet and fluctuates due to time of day, for example at 4pm i cant watch youtube videos, by 7pm i can play World of Tanks but not LoL. LoL comes in about 11pm. I connect to the router via wifi.
